Text: Dude,your uploads used to come in perfect packages encoded in mp4 format with an attractive bluray cover.Plz get back to that.It was awesome when u used to do that
Keep it up!!!mkv rocks compared to mp4!!more quality less size!!!keep up with ,mkv and ac3 codec!!!dont revert to .mp4 bcoz ther are already many groups releasing in mp4 formats !!!be unique,be new!!

@varuneric :agreed with you...Hdlite looked so attractive in past....with snapshots,sample,mp4 format ...blu ray cover...get back like before...
but one thing is still the same..quality .. :)
I doubt this is real HDLiTE: it's not available on kingdom-kvcd.net, whereas, as far as I know, all HDLiTE are. Kingdom does have a high-quality version of Rango from Release Lounge - also extended.
